noot.antlr.helpers
Class CheckerHelper

java.lang.Object
  noot.antlr.helpers.ScopeHelper
      noot.antlr.helpers.CheckerHelper

public class CheckerHelper
extends ScopeHelper

The Class CheckerHelper. This helper class is here to support the Checker. It will help annotating the AST, provide help with Scoping and helps checking for types.

Field Detail

currentDeclarationsMap

private HashMap<String,DeclarationNode> currentDeclarationsMap
The current declarations map. This map contains all the accessible declarations on the current level.

declarationsStack

private Stack<HashMap<String,DeclarationNode>> declarationsStack
The declarations stack. This Stack contains all the maps for all the declaration levels.

openScope

public void openScope()
Description copied from class: ScopeHelper
Open a new scope.

Overrides:
openScope in class ScopeHelper

closeScope

protected void closeScope()
                   throws NootException
Description copied from class: ScopeHelper
Close the current scope. This method is not supposed to be called directly, use tryToCloseScope() or releaseAndCloseScope(). It is here so it can be subclassed. Always call super.closeScope() in the subclassed method.

Overrides:
closeScope in class ScopeHelper
Throws:
NootException - exception will be thrown when requirements are ignored

declare

public void declare(DeclarationNode node)
             throws CheckerException
Declare a declaration node. This will add scoping information to the declaration node. And will make it possible to link IdentifierNodes to this DeclarationNode with the linkToDeclaration(IdentifierNode node) method. This method will throw an exception if node has already been declared with a certain identifier on the current level.

Parameters:
node - the declaration node to declare on the current scope level.
Throws:
CheckerException - the checker exception thrown when declaration already declared on current scoping level.

linkToDeclaration

public void linkToDeclaration(IdentifierNode node)
                       throws CheckerException
Link to identifier node to the correct declaration node in the accessible scopes. This will throw an exception if an identifier has not been declared in the accessible scopes.

Parameters:
node - the identifier node to link to a declaration
Throws:
CheckerException - the checker exception thrown if an identifier has not been declared in the accessible scopes.

checkExpressionsForType

public void checkExpressionsForType(List<Node> expressions,
                                    Node.NodeType type,
                                    Node operator)
                             throws CheckerException
Check if all input nodes have a specific type. This method throws an exception if that is not the case.

Parameters:
expressions - the expression nodes to check for the type
type - the type to check
operator - the operator, only here for logging and context information when exceptions are thrown
Throws:
CheckerException - the checker exception thrown when type mismatch occurs.

checkExpressionsForEqualType

public void checkExpressionsForEqualType(List<Node> expressions,
                                         Node operator)
                                  throws CheckerException
Check if all the input nodes have the same type. This method throws an exception if that is not the case.

Parameters:
expressions - the expression nodes to check for the same type
operator - the operator, only here for logging and context information when exceptions are thrown
Throws:
CheckerException - the checker exception thrown when type mismatch occurs.
